pages.text:
Growing
memories
Connecting families to the farm, for generations to come
FIRST SATURDAY
JUNK IN THE TRUNK
First Saturday of Every Month | 7:30 AM ‚Äì 1 PM
Brown‚Äôs Junk in the Trunk gives people the opportunity to buy and sell items, right out of the back of their vehicles and for shoppers to find a bargain!
Why bother with yard and garage sales, let us do your marketing for you and bring thousands to you!
learn more here
September 27th - October 26th
five weeks of fall
Saturdays @ 10 AM ‚Äì 8 PM | Sundays @ 11 AM ‚Äì 6 PM
Experience fall fun like never before with our 7-acre corn maze, 30+ attractions, barnyard animals, candy cannon blasts, and free fireworks on select nights!
Enjoy face painting at select times and themed weekends like Hometown Heroes, Wild West Showdown, Wine Your Way Around, Harvest Celebration, and Falloween Fest‚Äîall part of a community-driven celebration packed with memories for the whole family.
get tickets
learn more here

Connecting families to the farm
So Many Things To Do!
30+ Attractions
Photo Ops
good eats & TASTY TREATS

Jaxon F.
Fun place with little houses for kids
Mary T.
Today was the first time I attended Brown & Brown Farms. I usually work Saturdays, so I can not attend when they had the Strawberry festival. I brought my granddaughter and we walked the Junk in the trunk section, and then went on to pick strawberries, which turned out to be soooo sweet and delicious. My granddaughter also got to play on the playground. We love how all the equipment was made with 'farm' equipment. Last we rode the tractor ride to the country store. I had the best time and so did my granddaughter. Hopefully this will not be the last time I can visit Brown & Brown Farms. I look forward to the next time I can bring my granddaughter.
read more
read less
√ó

I brought my granddaughter and we walked the Junk in the trunk section, and then went on to pick strawberries, which turned out to be soooo sweet and delicious. My granddaughter also got to play on the playground. We love how all the equipment was made with 'farm' equipment. Last we rode the tractor ride to the country store. I had the best time and so did my granddaughter. Hopefully this will not be the last time I can visit Brown & Brown Farms. I look forward to the next time I can bring my granddaughter.

ABOUT US
OUR HISTORY
Rooted in a deep love for our community, we are committed to serving Central Florida and beyond by offering our legacy, expertise, quality produce, and farmland to our cherished customers and visitors.
With three generations of experience behind us, Brown & Brown Farms is a leader in our industry, a staple in our community, and a can‚Äôt-miss destination for you and your family.
LEARN MORE
BUY LOCAL
country store
Beginning as a roadside stand at our farm in 1977, Brown & Brown‚Äôs Country Store has grown into a 5,500 sq. ft. store packed with a variety of fresh foods.
At our country store, you‚Äôll find all kinds of produce either grown right here on the farm or locally. You‚Äôll also find an array of locally baked goods as well as Amish products, all hand selected by us because of their delicious flavors and excellent quality.
LEARN MORE
newsletter signup
Stay up to date with Brown & Brown‚Äôs newest events and offers!

Mary T.
Today was the first time I attended Brown & Brown Farms. I usually work Saturdays, so I can not attend when they had the Strawberry festival. I brought my granddaughter and we walked the Junk in the trunk section, and then went on to pick strawberries, which turned out to be soooo sweet and delicious. My granddaughter also got to play on the playground. We love how all the equipment was made with 'farm' equipment. Last we rode the tractor ride to the country store. I had the best time and so did my granddaughter. Hopefully this will not be the last time I can visit Brown & Brown Farms. I look forward to the next time I can bring my granddaughter.

ABOUT US
OUR HISTORY
Rooted in a deep love for our community, we are committed to serving Central Florida and beyond by offering our legacy, expertise, quality produce, and farmland to our cherished customers and visitors.
With three generations of experience behind us, Brown & Brown Farms is a leader in our industry, a staple in our community, and a can‚Äôt-miss destination for you and your family.
LEARN MORE
BUY LOCAL
country store
Beginning as a roadside stand at our farm in 1977, Brown & Brown‚Äôs Country Store has grown into a 5,500 sq. ft. store packed with a variety of fresh foods.
At our country store, you‚Äôll find all kinds of produce either grown right here on the farm or locally. You‚Äôll also find an array of locally baked goods as well as Amish products, all hand selected by us because of their delicious flavors and excellent quality.
